## noodles new

Creates a Noodles workspace, projects, or scripts

### Synopsis


Creates a Noodles workspace, projects, or scripts

```
noodles new [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help             help for new
  -p, --project string   Name of a new project you wish to bootstrap.
  -s, --script string    Name of a new script you wish to bootstrap
```
